availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth McAllister. Father of James McAllister, Charles McAllister, Morris McAllister, Julia McAllister, William F. McAllister, and Allen McAllister. Engineer in Greenup County in 1850. Farmer in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 2, p. 174. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 721. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 48. Find A Grave, "Harvey Cameron McAllister (1825-1896)," Memorial #8573811, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/8573811/harvey-cameron-mcallister (accessed June 15, 2017).
